query: SELECT 'projects' as tableName, COUNT(*) as count FROM projects UNION ALL SELECT 'assets' as tableName, COUNT(*) as count FROM assets UNION ALL SELECT 'sites' as tableName, COUNT(*) as count FROM sites UNION ALL SELECT 'systems' as tableName, COUNT(*) as count FROM systems;
